website_summaries.verdict: The perfect set for fans of the classic turtle titan, Blastoise. 6 packs of Sun & Moon: Unbroken Bonds cards, a trio of rare foil cards featuring Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise.
pros: Featuring 6 packs of Sun & Moon: Unbroken Bonds, you’ll get a nice range of cards from the 210-card set, which may include powerful cards like Muk & Alolan Muk-GX, Venomoth-GX, or Dedenne-GX
cons: Then again, with 210 cards in the set, it may be difficult to find the exact cards you want

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money, seller tampered with packs!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Just like some of the other reviews the booster packs were all tampered with. My son opened them and they were all junk cards and pulled no gx cards or any other quality cards. Instead there were repeats of junk cards. Lots of duplicates of cards which seems odd consider the packs included were different series. Very suspicious, avoid buying from Amazon and get this from Target or Walmart. We back similar booster packs there and they were better quality and less duplicates.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Awesome GX box! The blastoise card alone is worth $5!
customer_reviews.text: Box came in good condition. 6 booster packs all seem to be sealed from what I can tell! Going to make one six year old boy VERY happy on Christmas morning!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B

customer_reviews.title: Poke what?
customer_reviews.text: I know nothing about this stuff, but my kiddo was SUPER pumped over the cards he received in this set, so, WORTH IT! 🤣
customer_reviews.author: RyanL

customer_reviews.title: Awsome additon to my bro's collection
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get absolutely immaculate polls, but the limited addition full art Blastoise was great (wasn't printed in the set, so this is the only way to get it into your binder). #2gewda
customer_reviews.author: Card lover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and cheap
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my collection! Shipped in another box and packed well to ensure no damage was done to the box!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this set! Cheapest price I found at the time and my son loved it for his present!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Deney

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved it! Was his 5 birthday and that’s what these kids like nowadays. A
customer_reviews.author: Jeff takes Disney  on Youtube

customer_reviews.title: On time and what is represented
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time and doesn't look like any tampering was done. Just one break pokemon in the box. Better luck next time maybe.
customer_reviews.author: urzuse7en

customer_reviews.title: Product was used and been looked through
customer_reviews.text: All the cards in the box were glued shut. I thought the order was safe because it said it was "sold by Amazon" but I guess not. All the packs were used and had the very most worthless cards in them. I'm just upset cause it says product is brand new, but it is clearly used.
customer_reviews.author: Raven

customer_reviews.title: Best gift for Squirtle Pokémon fan
customer_reviews.text: This was the only thing my son wanted for Christmas in 2019. He was beyond excited to receive this as a gift! The joy on his face I will cherish it forever and I didn’t have to fight crowds at the store :)
customer_reviews.author: Taylor and Rachelle

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know anything about Pokémon but my boys were thrilled with these and they were significantly cheaper here than at Target.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old nephew went ballistic when he opened it for his birthday kept saying it was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: My nephew wanted this for 🎄, it arrived in a timely manner . He will love it !!!
customer_reviews.author: vicki

customer_reviews.title: Good quality made him happy!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves anything Pokémon. Gave as a birthday gift and he loved it!just what the young boys love!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Literally just an average Pokèmon TCG box
customer_reviews.text: It came in undamaged and untampered, got a Kingdra EX in one of the packs. However, pulls don't count, I'm giving it 5 stars because nothing is wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayden

customer_reviews.title: Worst pokemon product ive ever bought
customer_reviews.text: the packs were already opened when they arrived and had the code cards and possibly the rare cards taken out of them
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Suarez

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Seller literally opened all the packs, took all the promos and just gave us junk. This wasn’t worth the money I spent on it neither did the product description mentioned opened/missing cards.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lopez

product_meta.title: Pokemon Blastoise-Gx Premium Collection Box| 3 Foil Cards | 6 Booster Pack
product_meta.description: Trainers and fans of Water-type Pokémon, your day has come with the mighty rush of the blastoise-gx premium Collection, ready to wash away all doubt about which Pokémon rule the waves! Expand your collection with foil versions of Mighty little Squirtle and its evolutions, plus an awesome oversize version of blastoise-gx for display. Chart a course to victory with all the mighty currents at your command!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars174 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
